name: Partycles!
description:
NOW WITH EN LOCALIZATION AND TUTORIAL

IF YOU CAN PLEASE INSTALL NATIVE BUILD!

A nuclear arcade puzzle game

ACCELERATE!
COLLIDE!
DESTROY!
CREATE!

Game control:
Touch screen:

  • Running the particle - clamping and pulling the finger in the direction in which you want to send the particle
  • Stop - hold the particle with your finger
  • Radioactive decay (if the nucleus is unstable and shaking)- three consecutive taps
  • Camera (zoom, turns) - with two fingers with a swipe, moving your finger across the screen area without a particle, turning two fingers (normal touch control)

Mouse:

  • Running a particle - holding the click and moving the cursor to the side in which you want to send the particle
  • Stop - click-hold
  • Radioactive decay (if the nucleus is unstable and shaking) - three clicks in a row
  • Zoom - mouse wheel
  • Camera movement-clamped right mouse button
